definitions.definition: A monoamine C 8 H 11 NO 2 that is a decarboxylated form of dopa , present in the body as a neurotransmitter and a precursor of other substances including adrenalin .

main_definition: ( biochemistry , pharmacology ) A monoamine C 8 H 11 NO 2 that is a decarboxylated form of dopa , present in the body as a neurotransmitter and a precursor of other substances including adrenalin .
